wikipedia_page.main: Francis Mellersh (born 23 November 1786 in Slindon, Sussex; died 15 April 1849 in Slindon) was an English amateur cricketer who made 11 known appearances in first-class cricket matches from 1815 until 1830.

response: *Francis Mellersh (RAF officer) (1898–1955), World War I fighter ace and later Air Vice Marshal
*Francis Mellersh (RAF officer), KBE, AFC (1898–1955), Royal Naval Air Service aviator, flying ace, senior commander in the Royal Air Force
